post.body: Thank you! Hopefully you were off doing something else! Thank you for comment on post!
That's good means my tweet sent! Yes, lots in common I think! Use strengthsfinder with clients and hoping to go on SF Coaching
Lovely sentiment on the power of writing. What is it that helps you remember? And what makes you forget?
If you're still on, can you let me know if my blog post has shown? Showing as sent but not on tweetdeck?
Oh yes, so looking forwards to plans for coaching! Already got lots of plans in the pipeline. At least feeling a bit better 2day!
Happy New Year! How was it? Just been writing my first ezine of the new year yay!
Hi there! Without being dim(!) what's IFC? Thanks for the thoughts!
Fabulous - I've got it! I knew it was somewhere easy to find if only you knew how!
That is actually my one thing that is close to a resolution!
are you using twitter search? Will help you on keywords. Can also use tweetlater for this and get digest
Back at home from 30th. Lots of chilling and eating. Having a lazy day today (must get off twitter to do so!!)
Just nominated you for a shorty award for always being so on message for coaching. V inspirational!
I recommend @suzanschmitt in the Shorty Award category #business because...she is always on message re coaching!
Happy New Year Victoria! Very low key! Lots of sleeping and recovering from throat infection! How about you?
Check out @andreajlee, @cjhayden, @suzanschmitt as well as my own resources for coaches. What kind of coaching do you do?
That's a good logic. I like it!
New Blog Post - My 3 Goal Words for my coaching biz 2009 - what are yours?http://tinyurl.com/9n8422 (Thanks 2 @chrisbrogan)
Can anyone tell me how to set up typepad so only short amt shows on 1st page of blog entry and you need to click thru to read the rest?
Coaches: Where you are starting from is where you are starting from. Focus on forwards actions not past non action!
"Everyone's a star and deserves the right to twinkle."---Marilyn Monroe
